tasks.instruction:
Update the TAWIN Solutions website with the following changes:
1. Add tagline "Your Ambition, Accelerated"
2. Rename "Global Expansion" to "Global Vision" with updated description
3. Improve spacing on home screen for better aesthetics
4. Redesign services section with three expandable boxes on hover/click with provided content
5. Remove or update timeline references from 2024
6. Replace testimonials page with team section and "Why Choose TAWIN"
7. Change company name from "TAWIN Consultancy" to "TAWIN SOLUTIONS"
8. Add animations to enhance the luxury/prestige feel
